definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中國愛樂樂團將舉辦十二場系列音樂會。

sentences.english: When the Philharmonic's visit was announced, images of the Ping-Pong diplomacy of an earlier era were revived.
sentences.chinese: 當愛樂訪朝的消息公佈，早年乒乓外交的形象復甦了。

sentences.english: Given his background, Mr Elop could surely make such a partnership work.
sentences.chinese: 以愛樂普的背景，達成這樣的合作當然沒問題。

sentences.english: National Philharmonic Orchestra, Recorded September 9, 1971, London.
sentences.chinese: 國家愛樂樂團，1971年錄製，倫敦。

sentences.english: The apartment building located in Guanzhuang with an alien name called “Berlin Philharmonic”.
sentences.chinese: 房子位於管莊，名字很洋氣，叫柏林愛樂。

sentences.english: I had in mind something along the lines of the Liveville Philharmonic Orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏想的是“活用村愛樂管弦樂團”之類的。

sentences.english: I'm entertained by "Aprico Orchestra & Ballet Series: Invitation for Ballet music 2", Japan Philharmonic Orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 我很欣賞日本愛樂樂團的芭蕾舞音樂會在大田區民廳。

sentences.english: There are piano performers and music lovers all over the world. Piano craze in our country is now in the ascendant.
sentences.chinese: 現在習琴愛樂者遍佈全球，我國的鋼琴熱亦方興未艾。

sentences.english: Got a rose between entangled wounds, garment curtilage philharmonic film unlined upper garment not whole.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰糾纏間弄得一身傷痕，衣宅愛樂影視衫不整。

sentences.english: Elsewhere in the world, the New York Philharmonic played in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 在世界其他地方，紐約愛樂樂團在北朝鮮演出。

sentences.english: And she was a regular participant of Granz's famous Jazz at the Philharmonic.
sentences.chinese: 此外她還經常參加格蘭茲的紐約愛樂樂團的演出。

sentences.english: Shell Irus is a range of advanced fire resistant hydraulic fluids.
sentences.chinese: 殼牌愛樂施是一系列高級防火液壓油產品。

sentences.english: I watched LA LA LAND this week, finally.
sentences.chinese: 這周終於看了《愛樂之城》。

sentences.english: The Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra has already demonstrated its dedication to health.
sentences.chinese: 維也納愛樂樂團已經表明其致力於衛生事業的決心。

definition: to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
